project_descr: Renamed The Community Security Project, it supports the Somali government authorities in the development and implementation of key National Peacebuilding and Community Security Policies and the development of alternative sentencing guidelines.

outputs.output_descr: Small arms control and development of a regional and national legal framework, establishment of and capacity building on conflict management and peace building mechanisms & rehabilitation of victims of violence
Budget Revision  done to carry over  $ 745568 Japanese Funds (Youth for  Change)  from 2013 to 2014
Youth for Change Initiative, Phase II- Support to the improvement of security and the reduction of violence

project_title: ddr/armed violence reduction project in somalia
